title: "Virtual LLNL-UC Merced Data Science Challenge tackles asteroid detection though machine learning"
excerpt: "Over three weeks, students from the University of California, Merced collaborated online with mentors at Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory (LLNL) to tackle a real-world challenge problem: using machine learning to identify potentially hazardous asteroids that could pose an existential threat to humanity."
